pr_title: CMTS-28: Support fetching values by using metadata key resolver

timeline.bodyText: We have already a reflectionCache as an instance field. We could use that one.
timeline.author: gsfernandes

timeline.bodyText: I would say that in this case it should be a failure as the only case for this orElse is if the componentModel is not present or found for the declaration. It would mean that they were trying to resolve keys for a component that is not defined in any of the extension models declared for the session :S
timeline.author: gsfernandes

replies.bodyText: Please review the same case for types. It should fail if component is not found
replies.author: gsfernandes

timeline.author: gsfernandes

timeline.message: CMTS-28: Support fetching values by using metadata key resolver
